 * next cmake run.                                                         *

 ***************************************************************************/")

configure_file (
	"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/kdb.h"
	"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/kdb.h"
	)

configure_file (
	"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/kdbvar.h"
	"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/kdbvar.h"
	)

	)

	"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/kdbversion.h"

	)
